attributes.action: give free training to the unemployed lets meet demand and bring down unemployment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am sick of signing on for work thats not available i am a driver upto 7.5 ton and there is no work i have tried to get training for information technology but the jobcentre wont fund it and you cant do a course over 16 hours so your damned if you do and damned if you dont!!!
